summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Blaine Street from 9th Avenue West to 10th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 111337 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
